products.name: The Fellowship of the Ring
products.description: The first volume in J.R.R. Tolkien's epic masterwork, The Lord of the Rings. Follow Frodo Baggins as he begins his perilous journey to destroy the One Ring.

products.name: The Two Towers
products.description: The second volume of The Lord of the Rings continues the epic tale as the Fellowship is broken and darkness spreads across Middle-earth.

products.name: The Return of the King
products.description: The final volume of The Lord of the Rings brings the epic tale to its stunning conclusion as the fate of Middle-earth hangs in the balance.

products.name: The Hunger Games
products.description: In the ruins of North America lies Panem, where sixteen-year-old Katniss Everdeen volunteers for the Hunger Games in place of her younger sister.

products.name: Catching Fire
products.description: Katniss Everdeen has survived the Hunger Games, but the rebellion she has sparked is spreading across Panem in this explosive sequel.

products.name: Mockingjay
products.description: The final book in The Hunger Games trilogy brings Katniss face to face with President Snow in a final battle for Panem's future.
